item.title: Humanitarian Help
item.description: From the last years to nowadays, recent Humanitarian events, sanitarian crisis call to action. The power of the Humankind is in their collective memory about our history and what it would happen whether we don’t do anything. the well-known term, CoI (Cost of Inaction) teach us about passed experiences since the last 100 years. We need to restart and change our world for the future. New Principals and values can be built through the new vision of technology.

item.title: 1st Post
item.description: This is my new post to start with new contents about: - Business, Technology, and People. I’ll create new content and new ideas. 1. [Empathize] 2. [Define] 3. [Ideate] 4. [Prototype] 5. [Test] 6. [Play the game]

item.title: Umbrella Research
item.description: All this work are enveloped of experiences and passion. Focus on change the world, for a good present and a better future. this content has three cornerstones: People Business Technology This Concept is known as “Flux capacitor”, in spanish translation is “Condesador de fluzo”. It’s a reference to old school that we dream with the future, 35 years later I resign my life ;). People First, you must engage with all people around you, Don’t matter whether it is a stakeholder, you need know all people around you to learn how is the context and how you can improve their life.
